actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to extend to employees retired on account of disability prior to October 1, 1956, the minimum annuity base established for those retired after that date.

summary.text: Extends to Federal employees retired on account of disability prior to October 1, 1956, the minimum annuity base established for those retired after that date. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8339(g))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to extend to employees retired on account of disability prior to October 1, 1956, the minimum annuity base established for those retired after that date.
